sqlMap.sql:
SELECT ROWNUM RN , T1.* FROM( SELECT A.LIC_GRP_ID AS LIC_GRP_ID , A.STRG_REP_ID AS STRG_REP_ID , A.STRG_TYPE_CD AS STRG_TYPE_CD , SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO( #licGrpId#, 'STM00004', A.STRG_TYPE_CD, '1') AS STRG_TYPE_NM , A.STRG_REP_TITLE AS STRG_REP_TITLE , A.STRG_REP_URL AS STRG_REP_URL , A.STRG_TXT AS STRG_TXT
, A.STRG_USR_ID AS STRG_USR_ID , A.STRG_USR_PW AS STRG_USR_PW , A.STRG_KEY AS STRG_KEY , A.STRG_REP_NM AS STRG_REP_NM
, A.USE_CD AS USE_CD , SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO( #licGrpId#, 'CMM00001', A.USE_CD, '1') AS USE_NM FROM STM8000 A WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId#
AND A.STRG_REP_ID = #strgRepId#
AND A.USE_CD = #useCd#
AND A.STRG_TYPE_CD = #searchTargetData#
AND A.STRG_REP_TITLE LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%'
AND A.STRG_TXT LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%'
AND A.USE_CD = #searchTargetData#
ORDER BY $paramSortFieldId$
DESC
ASC
ORDER BY STRG_REP_ID DESC
) T1

sqlMap.insert:
SELECT NVL( SUBSTR(NEW_STRG_REP_ID, 1, 11) || LPAD( (TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(NEW_STRG_REP_ID, 12, 5)) + 1) , 5, '0') , 'REP' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || '00001' ) AS NEW_STRG_REP_ID FROM ( SELECT MAX(STRG_REP_ID) AS NEW_STRG_REP_ID FROM STM8000 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.STRG_REP_ID LIKE 'REP' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || '%' )
INSERT INTO STM8000 ( LIC_GRP_ID, STRG_REP_ID, STRG_TYPE_CD, STRG_REP_URL ,STRG_REP_TITLE, STRG_TXT, STRG_USR_ID, STRG_USR_PW ,STRG_KEY, STRG_REP_NM, USE_CD ,REG_DTM, REG_USR_ID, REG_USR_IP ,MODIFY_DTM, MODIFY_USR_ID, MODIFY_USR_IP ) VALUES ( #licGrpId#, #newStrgRepId#, #strgTypeCd#, #strgRepUrl# ,#strgRepTitle#, #strgTxt#, #strgUsrId#, #strgUsrPw# ,#strgKey#, #strgRepNm#, '01' ,SYSDATE, #regUsrId#, #regUsrIp# ,SYSDATE, #modifyUsrId#, #modifyUsrIp# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE STM8000 A SET STRG_USR_PW = #strgUsrPw# WHERE 1=1 AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.STRG_REP_ID = #strgRepId#
